00026 
00027 double EXIT::extrinsic_mutual_info(const itpp::vec &obs, const itpp::bvec &cond, const int &N)
00028 {
00029     //initialize histogram
00030     itpp::Histogram<double> hist(itpp::min(obs), itpp::max(obs), N);//common definition interval for both PDFs
00031 
00032     //conditional PDF knowing that a bit of 0 was emitted
00033     itpp::ivec idx = itpp::find(cond==itpp::bin(0));
00034     itpp::vec cond_obs = obs(idx);
00035     hist.reset();//start counting
00036     hist.update(cond_obs);
00037     itpp::vec left_pdf = hist.get_pdf();//the pdf is computed without taking into account the interval length (step)
00038     itpp::ivec left_int = itpp::find(left_pdf!=0);//integration interval for the left PDF
00039 
00040     //conditional PDF knowing that a bit of 1 was emitted
00041     idx = itpp::find(cond==itpp::bin(1));
00042     cond_obs = obs(idx);
00043     hist.reset();//restart counting
00044     hist.update(cond_obs);
00045     itpp::vec right_pdf = hist.get_pdf();
00046     itpp::ivec right_int = itpp::find(right_pdf!=0);//integration interval for the right PDF
00047 
00048     //mutual extrinsic information
00049     itpp::vec left_half = itpp::elem_mult(left_pdf(left_int), itpp::log2(itpp::elem_div(2.0*left_pdf(left_int), left_pdf(left_int)+right_pdf(left_int))));
00050     double IE = itpp::sum(left_half)-0.5*(left_half(0)+left_half(left_half.length()-1));//numerical integration without taking into account the inteval length (see conditional PDF computation)
00051     itpp::vec right_half = itpp::elem_mult(right_pdf(right_int), itpp::log2(itpp::elem_div(2.0*right_pdf(right_int), left_pdf(right_int)+right_pdf(right_int))));
00052     IE += itpp::sum(right_half)-0.5*(right_half(0)+right_half(right_half.length()-1));//numerical integration
00053     IE *= 0.5;
00054 
00055     return IE;
00056 }
00057 
00058 }//namespace tr
